original_text: The Lord will make Israel safe. Israel will be safe and free for ever. You will never be ashamed again. People will never insult you again. The Lord will make Israel safe. Israel will be safe and free for ever. You will never be ashamed again. People will never insult you again. The Lord will make Israel safe.
korean_text: 이스라엘은 여호와께 구원을 받아 영원한 구원을 얻으리니 너희가 영원히 부끄러움을 당하거나 욕을 받지 아니하리로다

sentences.original_text: The Lord will make Israel safe.
Israel will be safe and free for ever.
You will never be ashamed again.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다시는 수치를 당하지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: People will never insult you again.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 다시는 너를 모욕하지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord will make Israel safe.
Israel will be safe and free for ever.
You will never be ashamed again.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다시는 수치를 당하지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: People will never insult you again.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 다시는 너를 모욕하지 않을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: The Lord will make Israel safe.
